content: varies prefer knitting from charts can refer to the chart rather than the written instructions you do not repeat the cast on 11 information in the brackets you will still need to read the written instructions for the non-lace portion of the scarf but it s easy i promise pdf version 1 0 date november 10 2009 changes/modifications n/a designed by liz abinante feministy com | support@feministy com | ravelry feministy | twitter feministy instructions increase section each repeat will give you one leaf six leaves are shown in the sample cast on 11 stitches row 01 k4 slm k to m m1l slm k3 yo k1 yo k2 row 1 k4 pm k1 pm k6 row 02 p6 k1fb k1 slm p to m slm k4 row 2-4 knit all stitches row 03 k4 slm k to m slm k2 p1 k2 yo k1 yo k3 work increase sections 6x row 04 p8 k1fb k2 slm p to m slm k4 work straight sections 10x row 05 k4 slm k to m m1l slm k2 p2 k3 yo k1 yo k4 work decrease sections 6x row 06 p10 k1fb k3 slm p to m slm k4 finish row 07 k4 slm k to m m1l slm k2 p3 ssk k5 k2tog k1 leaf edge chart row 08 p8 k1fb p1 k3 slm p to m slm k4 row 09 k4 slm k to m m1l slm k2 p1 k1 p2 ssk k3 k2tog k1 i have charted the leaf edging for those row 10 p6 k1fb k1 p1 k3 slm p to m slm k4 who prefer working from charts remember that this chart is only for the row 11 k4 slm k to m slm k2 p1 k1 p3 ssk k1 k2tog k1 edging you will still need to consult the row 12 p4 k1fb k2 p1 k3 slm p to m slm k4 written instructions for the increases and row 13 k4 slm k to m m1l slm k2 p1 k1 p4 slk2p k1 decreases of the scarf body the chart is also printed on the second page for row 14 p2tog bind off 3 k1 p1 k3 slm p to m slm k4 reference repeat row 1-14 until right and wrong side row are charted a desired width is achieved read right side row from r to l wrong side row from l to r straight section each repeat will give you one leaf ten leaves are shown in the sample row 01 k4 slm k to m slm k3 yo k1 yo k2 row 02 p6 k1fb k1 slm p to m slm k4 row 03 k4 slm k to m slm k2 p1 k2 yo k1 yo k3 row 04 p8 k1fb k2 slm p to m slm k4 row 05 k4 slm k to m slm k2 p2 k3 yo k1 yo k4 row 06 p10 k1fb k3 slm p to m slm k4 row 07 k4 slm k to m slm k2
